original_text: The woman said, ‘I think that you have done a wrong thing like this against God's own people. You have not let your own son return to his home. He still lives in a foreign city. Because of what you have said to me, you show that you yourself are guilty.
korean_text: 여인이 이르되 그러면 어찌하여 왕께서 하나님의 백성에게 대하여 이같은 생각을 하셨나이까 이 말씀을 하심으로 왕께서 죄 있는 사람 같이 되심은 그 내쫓긴 자를 왕께서 집으로 돌아오게 하지 아니하심이니이다

sentences.original_text: I think that you have done a wrong thing
like this against God's own people
You have not let your own son return
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 자신의 아들이 돌아가도록 허락하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: He still lives in a foreign city
Because of what you have said to me
you show that you yourself are guilty
